328b4('bum): dag pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong / pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu man+ta
328b5('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du bsam gtan kun tu mtha' yas pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa yad pa/ rab 'byor shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir blo
328b6('bum): gsolang ba ga bcom ldan 'das kyi'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas bsam gtan kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sas lad pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / 
329a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du tshad myed pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da shi nad/ 
329a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra/ 
329a3('bum): saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol dad pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas gzu dgas myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par
329a4('bum): dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ mtha la las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyi ra ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas
329a5('bum): pa'i slad du rnam par tha rang pa brgyad kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saH'ang ba/ rab 'byor nga shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas/ 
329a6('bum): pas rnam par thard pa brgyad kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom
329a7('bum): ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// 
329b1('bum): gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlang pa/ mtha' las 'das
329b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa kun tu mtha' yas
329b3('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bca ya pa/ rab 'byor nga ginang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas rnam par thadad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan sa skyed pa dang / 
329b4('bum): smon pa myed pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lang ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi dang dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsolang pa
329b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHla / rab 'byor bani nang tu rnam par dgu pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcwa
329b6('bum): ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yos pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
329b7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du ting nge 'dzi nang kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/ 
329b8('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas ting nge 'dzi nang kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang
330a1('bum): ma ma byed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sacal pa/ rab 'byor nga ginang tu ne bar dag pa'i
330a2('bum): phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad tu bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlang ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma
330a3('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor shi nad tu rnam
330a4('bum): par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' ya das pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa
330a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du myi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
330a6('bum): kyis bka' bas lang ba/ rab 'byor gi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas myi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
330a7('bum): bka' sa lang pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol ma bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
330a8('bum): kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
330b1('bum): kyis bka' saHlad pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// 
330b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lang pa/ rab 'byor da shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam
330b3('bum): bang dag pa lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du thams
330b4('bum): cad shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal saHlang pa/ rab 'byor shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol radra pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas thams cad shes pa
330b5('bum): nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'ad/ kas kyis bka' saHlang ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi/ da dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsold pa bcom
330b6('bum): ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du la gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byord shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das
330b7('bum): ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
330b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saH lad pa/ rab 'byor da shi nid tu/ 
331a1('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
331a2('bum): sa lad pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// bam pa
331a3('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar rtogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor shi nad tu rnam par dag
331a4('bum): pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gang de ltar rtogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad
331a5('bum): ba/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro// lam shes pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'angs gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
331a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// tshu rol gyi 'gram 'am/ pha rold kyi 'gram 'am/ gnyis ka'i dbus na myi gnas na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o/ 
331a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la pyod pa'i tshe/ 
331a8('bum): tshu rol kyi 'gra'am/ pha rol kyi 'gram 'am gnyis ka'i dbus na myi gnas shing / shi nad tu rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da dus gsuM mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro// 
331b1('bum): gsosang ba bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de thabs kyi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la dmyigs pa'i tshul du 'du shes par bgyid pa ni shes rab kyi
331b2('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa gsog tu 'byind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ring du spong ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor da lags so lags so// rab 'byor da de ni
331b3('bum): kyi yang chags pa yin/ mtshan mar yang chags pa yon/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na mying du yang chags shing mtshan mar yang chags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la
331b4('bum): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mying du 'dzind tam/ mtshan mar 'dzi nad na/ de ni zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mying dang mtshan mar
331b5('bum): 'dzin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gsog tu 'byind to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ring du spong ngo // rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi bu
331b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la mtshan mar 'dzi nad cing / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la mtshan mar bzung nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas rlom sems su byed na/ 
331b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas rlom sems su byed cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gsog tu 'byind to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ring du spong ngo // rab 'byorade
331b8('bum): kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'ang de ltar lags par bshad cing legs par bstan la chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang ma
332a1('bum): chim bcos 'du / denas che dang ldan pa nang dwa ti'i bus pa dang ldan parab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// de dang ldan pa rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chanas pa ni gang yin / mchags
332a2('bum): pani gang yin rab 'byor kyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am// rigs kyi bu mo thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzugs stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 
332a3('bum): tshochor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du shes stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes ma chags pa'o// 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// myig
332a4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sde stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lus stong pa zhes bya bar
332a5('bum): 'du shes na chags pa'o// ying stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags/ pa'o// ling stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzugasastong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sgra stong pa zhes bya bar
332a6('bum): 'du shes nachags pa'o// dri stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o/ ro stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// reg spong ba zhes bya bar 'du shos na chags pa'o// chos stong ba zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 
332a7('bum): tshig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// na ba'i rnam par shes pastong pa zhes bya bar shes na chags pa'o// 'i rnam par shes pa stong ba zhes bya ba 'du shes nachags pa'o// kye'i rnam pa shes bathong na/ 
332a8('bum): zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rtsig gi 'dus te reg pa stong ba zhes bya bar 'du
332b1('bum): gsu pags pa'o/ na ba'i chus te na pa stong ba zhes bya ba chu zhes spa gas pa'o// 'i chus te ga pastong pa zhes bya ba sugs nachags pa'o// sde'i dus te reg pastong ba zhes bya bar 'jushes nachags pa'o/ sus kyi yus
332b2('bum): te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus
332b3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes ma chags pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na/ 
332b4('bum): chags pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sa'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chag ches pa'o// chu'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 
332b5('bum): me'i khams stong pa zhes bya ba bdu shes na chags pa'o// rlung gi 'am nyes stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// nam mtha'i khams s+ho/ nga ba zhes bya bar 'du shes mchags pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams
332b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ma rig pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mying dang gzug
332b7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// skye mched drug stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes ma chags pa'o// reg pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sred pa stong pa zhes
332b8('bum): bya bar 'du shes ma chags pa'o// len pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// srid pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// skye ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rgani stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
332b9('bum): mid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes ma chags pa'o// 
333a1('bum): mchags pa'o// sbyin pa'i ba sang tu byid paskong pa zhes bya bar 'chu shes nachags pa'o// chus drims kyi ro tu byed paskyong pa zhes bya ba chushes nachags pa 'o/ yod pa'i mchod tu phyid pa stong ba zhes bya ba/ 
333a2('bum): 'du shes na chags pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong
333a3('bum): ba zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// nang stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 
333a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// don dam pa stong ngapa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa
333a5('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// thog ma dang
333a6('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dong ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa
333a7('bum): zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du
333a8('bum): shes na chags pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
333b1('bum): na chags pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dbang po rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// stobs rjes
333b2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
333b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// bsam gtan rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa zhes
333b4('bum): bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju/ dag pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par thang
333b5('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa stong pa zhes khya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams stong pa zhes bya
333b6('bum): bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// myi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na
333b7('bum): chags pa'o// se so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// byams pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// snying rje chen po stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sangs rgyas
333b8('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa zhes bya ba 'du shes na chags pa'o// rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes ma chags pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags paro/ 
334a1('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rang byang chub stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// lam kyi rnam
334a2('bum): pa shes pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg
334a3('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs myi mkhas pas 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes
334a4('bum): na chags pa'o// da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzha na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
334a5('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dmyigs pa'i tshul du sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar bzung nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myod na chags pa'o// tshul khri mas kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na chags pa'o// 
334a6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myod na chags pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na chags pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na chags pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
334a7('bum): ba la spyod na chags pa'o// nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o/ 
334a8('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la pyod na chags pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la pyod na chags pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
334b1('bum): la spyod na chags pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la pyod na chags pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
334b2('bum): spyod na chags pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la dpyod na chags pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chag
334b3('bum): pa'o// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams la pyod na chags pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod na
334b4('bum): chags pa'o// dbang po rnams la myod na chags pa'o// stobs rnams dal spyod na chags pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na chags dpa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na
334b5('bum): chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o/ bsam gtan rnams la pyod na chags pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams la pyod na chags pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
334b6('bum): pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam par thard pa rnams la pyod na chags pa'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa
334b7('bum): dang smon pa myed pa la spyod na chags pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la pyod na chags pa'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
334b8('bum): stobs rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// myi 'jigs pa rnams la pyod na chags pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la pyod na chags pa'o// byams pa chen po la spyod na chags pa'o// snying rje chen po la
335a1('bum): spyod na chags pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dpyod na chags pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// phyir myi 'ong
335a2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu la spyod na chags pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rang byang chub la spyod na chags pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod na
335a3('bum): chags pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod ba rnams kyi chags pa myed pa gang zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa
335a4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen na po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa nig/ zugs la gzugs shes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// tshor ba la
335a5('bum): tshor ba zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 'du shes la 'du shes zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 'du byed la 'du byed ces bya bar 'du shes pa byed do// rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du/ 
335a6('bum): shes pa myed do// 'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos
335a7('bum): shes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no// 'di la ni/ 
335a8('bum): sbyin pa zhig sbyin no// sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sbyin no zhe'am/ bdag gis ni tshul khrims zhig bsrung ngo // tshul khrims 'di lta bu zhig srung ngo zhe'am/ bdag gis bzod pa zhig skom so// bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig skom mo// 
335b1('bum): zhe 'am/ bdag gis ni brtson 'grus zhig rtsom mo// brtson 'grus 'di lta bu zhig rtsom mo zhe'am/ bdag gis ni bsam rten la mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par gzhag go/ 
335b2('bum): zhe'am/ bdag gis zhi shes rab zhig sgrom mo// shes rab 'di lta bu zhig sgrom mo zhe'am/ bdag gis mi bsod nams zhig bskyed do// bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do// bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do// 
335b3('bum): bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed pa la chud par bya'o// bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing long su dag par bya'o// bdag gis ni sems can yongasu sbyin par bya'o zhe'am/ bdag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyed
335b4('bum): ba nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa myed de/ tshe dang ldan ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkha sa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ni rnam par
335b5('bum): rtog pa de lta bu thams cad nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong
335b6('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba skyed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid da
335b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myed cing kyi rgyu ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
335b8('bum): bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i chags pa myed pa dag go// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da la 'di
336a1('bum): skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam grangs gang gis na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags par 'gyur ba yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis
336a2('bum): shA lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos sems su 'du shes pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang par 'du shes pa dang / 
336a3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind par 'du shes pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind par 'du shes pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind par 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind par 'du shes pa dang / 
336a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par 'du shes pa dang // nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 
336a5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma bya/ stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
336a6('bum): nyid du 'du shes pa dang / thog sa dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dor pa byed pa stong pa nyid tu 'du shes pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'dugs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang gi mtsha
336a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
336a8('bum): du 'du shes pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / dbang po rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 
336b1('bum): stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / bsam rtan
336b2('bum): rnams su 'du shes pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
336b3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed par 'du shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzind rjes
336b4('bum): su 'du shes pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / so so yang dag/ par rig pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byams pa chen por 'du
336b5('bum): shes pa dang / snying rje chen por 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su 'du shes par gyur te/ sangs rgyas la
336b6('bum): bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag tu 'du shes nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu brtul nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo zhing yongasu sngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag
336b7('bum): ni ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste/ chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na/ chags pa myed pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par myi nus
336b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ke'u shi ka gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongasu bsngo bar myi nus so// tshor ba'i rang bzhin yong su sngo bar myi nus so// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin yongasu sngo bar myi nus so// 'du byed kyi rang
337a1('bum): bzhin yongs su sngo bar gyi byas so/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dngas su bsngo bar gyi nus so// myig gi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar gyi nus so// na pa'i rang bzhi yongs su sngo bar kyi nus so// sgra'i rang bzhin
337a2('bum): yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lce'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// yid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// gzugs kyi rang bzhin yong su sngo bar myi nus so// smra
337a3('bum): rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dri'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// ro'i rang bzhin yongs su spo bar myi nus so// reg gi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar gyi nus so// chos kyi rang bzhin yong su sngo bar gyi nus so// 
337a4('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rna ba ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lce'i rnam par shes
337a5('bum): zhin sos su sngo ba kyi nus / lus kyi rnam pa shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su rdzob gyi nus so// yid kyi rnam par shes bzhin yongs su tho bar gyi sa s+ho// byig gi yul te den
337a6('bum): bu'i rang bzhin yong su sngo bar myi nus so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yong su sngo bar gyi
337a7('bum): nus so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongasasu sngo bar gyi
337a8('bum): nus so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar gyi nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
337b1('bum): kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yong su sngo bar myi nus so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi
337b2('bum): nus so// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// me'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin yongasu spo ba
337b3('bum): myi nus so// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// ma rig pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin
337b4('bum): yongasu sngo bar myi nus so// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// skye mched drug gi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus
337b5('bum): reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// tshor ba'i rang bzhi na yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// len pa'i rang bzhin yongasu sngo bar myi nus so/ 
337b6('bum): srid pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// skye ba'i rang bzhin yongasu sngo bar myi nus so// rga shi'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 
337b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sde
337b8('bum): bar myi nus so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo/ 
338a1('bum): gyi nus so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongasu sngo bar myi nus so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin sto rjes su sngo bar myi nus so/ 
338a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 'dus ma byas
338a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 
338a4('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus
338a5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nu sa so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus/ so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
338a6('bum): yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar gyi nus so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo zlar gyi nus so// dran pa nye bar gri nag
338a7('bum): kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yo myi nus so// dbang po
338a8('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// byang chub kyi yan lak+Sha rnams kyi rang bzhina'aphags
338b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar rgyo tshus sto/ bas kyi gtan rnams kyi dag sbyin yongs su sngo bar
338b2('bum): gyi nus so// tshad byed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su spyo ban myi nus so/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi
338b3('bum): rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar gyi nus so sabad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar gyi dus so nam thong ba dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ni margyan ma rgyad
338b4('bum): ba dang / smod pa byed pa'i rang bzhi yongs su sngo bar gyi nus ste/ mdzad par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo ba kyi nus so / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi
338b5('bum): bzhin mongs su sngo ba gyinas s+ho// gsus kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar gyi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rnams kyi rang bzhi dayongs su sngo byang kyi dus
338b6('bum): kyi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar sti nus ma sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi num so// byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su sngozar
338b7('bum): nus so// snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su rdzo bar gyi nus so// rgyun tu
338b8('bum): shugs bu'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'dras
339a1('bum): bu'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 
339a2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub
339a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan zhig bla na myed par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstand tam/ yang dag par bskul lam/ yang dag par spo ba bskyed dam/ yang dag
339a4('bum): par dga' bar byas na / yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan la yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dag par bskul par bya'o// yang dag par spo ba
339a5('bum): babyed par bya'o// ya dag par dga' ba skyed par byar/ des cis kyang byin pa'i rgod tu phyin pa sa byed pa'i bdag ni phyir 'di ba ra tu phyin pas myodang do zhes
339a6('bum): bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi
339a7('bum): 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
339a8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
339b1('bum): pa'i tshebadag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni shes rab
339b2('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshebadag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur
339b3('bum): ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la dpyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshebadag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid
339b4('bum): pa spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi
339b5('bum): 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid la pyod pa'i tshe bad ga ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par gyi 'gyur ba dang / do dam pa stong pa nyid la gyod pa'i tshe
339b6('bum): bdag ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par
339b7('bum): rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das
339b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myod ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myong ba'i
340a1('bum): ce bdag ni logs dang ma 'byed pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dong bskyed pastong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dong bskyed pa stong pa nyid la myong nga/ 
340a2('bum): zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myong nga zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad
340a3('bum): stong pa nyid la gyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang gi/ 
340a4('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog/ dbar myi 'gyur ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa 'i tshe/ bdag ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la
340a5('bum): myod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog
340a6('bum): bar myi 'gyur ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'apyod ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par gyi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
340a7('bum): pa gyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni
340a8('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod
340b1('bum): do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la pyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 
340b2('bum): dbang po rnams la myod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dbang po rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod de
340b3('bum): zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la pyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi
340b4('bum): 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam/ yan lag brgyad pa la myong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog
340b5('bum): bar myi 'gyur ba dang 'phags pa'i bden pa na mas la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam sa la myong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 
340b6('bum): bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / chad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshad byed
340b7('bum): pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs myod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la dpyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
340b8('bum): ba rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par tha dad pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la myong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par
341a1('bum): kyi 'gyur ba dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bapyod do zhes bya bar rnam
341a2('bum): par rtog par gyi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par thadad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma skyed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
341a3('bum): smond pa myed pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur
341a4('bum): ba dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni
341a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa ra gyi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs par stobs rnams la myod pa'i tshe bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs
341a6('bum): rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni myi 'jigs pa rnams la myong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang
341a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni
341a8('bum): byams pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i ched/ bdag ni snying rje chen po la myod de zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par gyi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi
341b1('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la myong ba'i tshe/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe
341b2('bum): bdag ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la pyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes
341b3('bum): bye bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la khyod ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dgra btso ba nyid la gyod pa
341b4('bum): tshe/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la bapyod do zhes bya bar rnamapar rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur
341b5('bum): po dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bskyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par skye 'gyur ba dang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe bdag
341b6('bum): ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstand par bya/ yang dag par bskul bar bya/ yang dag par sro ba bskyed par bya'o// yang dag par dga' ba/ 
341b7('bum): bskyed par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstand par bya'o// yang dag par bskul bar bya'o// yang dag par sro/ 
341b8('bum): ba bskyed par bya'o// yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de yang dag par bstand pa de dang / yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par gro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang / yang dag par dka' ba bskyed par bya ba des

313b8('bum2): pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su gyur te/ de dag thas cad la ye shes dang spong ba gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
314a1('bum2): pa zangab mo 'di la gdugs gcig du mos shing sams te gzhal ba dang brtag pa dang / spyad pa gnyis ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs cig tu mos pa de nyid ces legs pa'i/ 
314a2('bum2): mchog tu 'gyur ro// de'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dang ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong gang ji snyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i brjos
314a3('bum2): par 'dus so// chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang / spong la gang ji tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// brgyad pa'i ye she
314a4('bum2): gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po de ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa

314a8('bum2): gang ci tsam pa dang / spong ba gang ca tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por myo skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na myong ba dang gzugs yod pa mdzus
314b1('bum2): pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tshim pa dang / spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos
314b2('bum2): la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so//

314b6('bum2): ma bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so/ dag bcom pa nyid kyi mi shes gang nitsam pa dang / slong ba gang tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa tho pa'i bzod par 'dus sa/ 
314b7('bum2): rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ci tsam pa dang spong ba gang ci tsam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so// lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi phuH/ 
314b8('bum2): gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la nyan cing thos nas 'dri ba dang bris nas lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid pa de dag ni myur du 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ 1
315a1('bum2): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral ba'i mdo sde gzhan laskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar gyur pa de dag ni ma yin no// de ci'i
315a2('bum2): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las phul du byung ba'i chos gang la dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyu nang tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir
315a3('bum2): 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang / gang la de bzhin gshegs pa
315a4('bum2): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs/ te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

315a7('bum2): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 'di ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la bslabs shing dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams 'byung bar/

316a1('bum2): myi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur la/ rmongs par myi 'gyur zhing / the tsom myi za nem nur mi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par dga' zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu

319a2('bum2): rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub spos dpe'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs

319a4('bum2): zhun par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa theg pa pa gang gis sngon go mthar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid thos
319a5('bum2): kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rolong tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bston pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum por 'gyur/ seMs kyi
319a6('bum2): rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byo rod gzhan yang gang zag byang chub ses dpa' theg pa pa sngon gi mthar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa mi byas pa de ni/ shes ra/ 
319a7('bum2): kyi pha rol tu phyin dri pa zang mo 'dri ba ston pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyuraro/ sems kyi rnam gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dgazhan yang / 
319a8('bum2): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid thos kyang yongs su mi dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
319b1('bum2): bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byorang gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
319b2('bum2): bya pa gang gis sngon gi mthar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongasu brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi na pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur
319b3('bum2): rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byo rang gzhan yang gzug byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar yang dag par smo/

319b5('bum2): seMs kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor da gzhan yang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi// / mthar rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi thos kyang yongasu ma dris yong su brtag pa
319b6('bum2): ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol du 'i nang pa zab mo 'di bsnun pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum para'agyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor dgazhan
319b7('bum2): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa gang gis sngon gi mthar dbang po lnga thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di bston pa'o//

320b7('bum2): gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i thog pa pa grang gis sngon gi mthar thams cad shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa doni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis
320b8('bum2): pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi mthar la/ 
321a1('bum2): gi rnam pa shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhu

321a3('bum2): su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
321a4('bum2): gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gi/ mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos nas yongasu ma dris yongs su la brtags pa ma byas pa ste/ nyi ma gcig
321a5('bum2): gam gnyis sam gsum 'am bzhi 'am lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de shes rab kyi pha ro// lang tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dra zhing rtog pa dang / nyi ma
321a6('bum2): gcig gam gnyis sam gsum 'am bzhi 'am lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di myi 'phrogs par myi 'gyur te/ yongs su 'dri ba dang yang myi ldan pa
321a7('bum2): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar yang 'gyur to// gang gis shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mong sum dris so sum brtags zhing / rjes su 'brang bar ma byas pa de ni ma
321a8('bum2): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa la de tsam gi dge ba'i rtsa bci tsam pa dang / mos pa bskyed par 'gyur te/ de ni bar bar mos shing bar bar mi mos pa skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni ldam ldem gi blo de 'phrog
321b1('bum2): shing / shing bal gi gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas theg pa la zhugs pa yin par rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongs su
321b2('bum2): bzung ba'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor nga gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di lung ma mnos/ kha ton ma
321b3('bum2): byas la tshul bzhin yid la ma byas te des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma bslabs so// bas gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma bslabs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la ma bslabs so/ bzod
321b4('bum2): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la ma bslabs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so// nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// phyi stong pa nyid la ma slabs/ 
321b5('bum2): so// phyi nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la ma sA bas so// chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// don dam pa stong / pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la ma slabs
321b6('bum2): so 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lam bslangs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sa ma spabs sa/ thog ma da mas myed pa stong pa nyid pam spabs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid lam slabs so// rang babazhin stong pa
321b7('bum2): nyid la ma slabs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ma slabs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma slabs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la ma slabs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so// 
321b8('bum2): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma slabs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stob pa nyid la ma bslabs so// ngan pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma slabs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams la ma slabs so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang
322a1('bum2): pa rnams la ma slabs so// dbang po rnams la ma slabs so// stobs rnams la ma slabs so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma slabs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma slabs so// 'phags
322a2('bum2): pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams la ma slabs so// bsam gtan rnams la ma slabs so// char myeng pa rnams la ma slabs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma slabs so// rnam par thard pa rnams la/ 
322a3('bum2): ma slabs so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma slabs so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la ma slabs so// mngon par shes pa rnams la ma slab so//

322a5('bum2): la ma slabs so// byams pa chen po la ma skabs so// snying rje chen po la ma slabs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lam slabs so// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma slabs so// 
322a6('bum2): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma slabs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma slabs so// dag bcom pa nyid la ma slabs so// rang byang chub la ma slabs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma slabs so// rnam pa thos
322a7('bum2): cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma slangs so// rab 'byor da gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/ de ni dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de/ 
322a8('bum2): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa zab mo 'di/ bri ba 'am/ klag pa 'am/ lung 'bog pa 'am/ kha ton bya ba 'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar myi nus so// rab 'byor nga gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
322b1('bum2): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri zhing lung myi 'bogs pa dang / kha ton myi byed pa dang tshu bzhin du yid la myi byed pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'dis gzhan
322b2('bum2): la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas gzhan
322b3('bum2): la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs
322b4('bum2): pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nga nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis
322b5('bum2): gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzha/ na la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzha/ na la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la/

322b7('bum2): la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la pan myi 'dogs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dog
322b8('bum2): pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnadangos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / mdo jog

323a1('bum2): par spong ba rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dbang po rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan
323a2('bum2): myi 'dogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs
323a3('bum2): pa dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rna pa tha ra da pa/ 
323a4('bum2): brgyad kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan gyi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo song ba nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas gzhan la phan myi 'dog/ 
323a5('bum2): pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'degs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / gzung sa kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la pa ni myi 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin gshis
323a6('bum2): pa'i stobs bcus gzhan la phan myi 'degs pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / byis pa chen pos gzhan la phan myi 'don
323a7('bum2): pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgya ga/ zhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rgyunang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras dus
323a8('bum2): zhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / lam gi rnam pa shes pazhin
323b1('bum2): kyis gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun par myi spyod do// 
323b2('bum2): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang mthun par myi spong / 
323b3('bum2): stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dang mthun
323b4('bum2): par myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ 'dus ma byasastong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dung mthun par myi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par
323b5('bum2): myi spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mthu/ na par myi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ 
323b6('bum2): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid snang pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhog pa
323b7('bum2): rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang mthun par myi spyod do// rdzu 'phrul go rkang pa rnaMs dang mthun par myi spyod/ dbang po rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ stobs rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan la
323b8('bum2): rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang mthun par myi sbeng/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes dang mthun par myi spyod/ bsam rtan rnaMs dang mthun par myi spyod/ tshad myong pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyod// 
324a1('bum2): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mthun par myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthun par myi spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rgyu dang mthun par myi spyod/ rnam par thar
324a2('bum2): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed par mthun par myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang mthun par myi spyod/ de bzhin
324a3('bum2): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mthun par myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang mthun par mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang mthun par myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang mthun par myi spong rgyu nad tu zhug
324a4('bum2): pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun par myi spyod lani cig phyig 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par myi spyod/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun par mi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ rang byang chub dang mthun par
324a5('bum2): myi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod na/ de ni gan gnyis dang sa gcig po las gcig la gnas par 'gyur te/ de ni 'di
324a6('bum2): ltar nyan thos kyi sa dang // rang sangs rgyas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngor yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ma bris ma bstan/ kha ton du ma byas
324a7('bum2): tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dis kyang / pha rol la phan ma btags/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
324a8('bum2): rang mthun pa ma spyad pas/ de'i phyir byang chub ses dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis dngas gnyis po de las gcig la gnas par rig par bya'o// 'phags pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
324b1('bum2): stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su gru zhig la/ myi rnams shing ngam/ shing dum ngam/ shing leb bam/ rgyal ba 'am rol
324b2('bum2): myi 'ju myi 'dzin na/ rab 'byor nga myi dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol kyi 'gram du ma phyin par dus byed par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da myi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa'i tshe/ shing ngam shing dum dam/ shing leb bam/ rgyal
324b3('bum2): po 'am ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par myi 'gyur te/ bde zhing nyam nyes myed par rgya mtsho chen po'i nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyind par 'gyur te/ mnyes ma nyams par mthar phyinid par 'gyur ro// rab 'byord
324b4('bum2): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa tsam dang / ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la
324b5('bum2): myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'dri myi stonang / kha ton du mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi 'di myi ston kha ton tu myi
324b6('bum2): byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing mi rten pa dang / bzod pa'i pha ro/ la tu phyind pa myi 'di myi ston/ kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa myi 'di myi ston
324b7('bum2): khaton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang po myi 'od myi stonang / kha ton du mi byang tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtond pa dang // nang stong pa nyid myi 'di myi stonang / kha tin
324b8('bum2): byang chum dzin du sa nyid kyi na / phyi nga ma ningos mi 'i gyi mdado/ 'aton sa skye tshul bzhin du ming sa myi gyi tshong myin pa nga/ byon grong ba nyid gyi ma ma pa tan du phyi tshul bzhin du mi myi byid/ 
324b9('bum2): gyin pang / gleng nyid pa zhi cu 'dum stor/ 'atid phying tshul bzhin du mi dpa kyi bya sbyin nga / sa mi dag du kyi tshus bzhin du mongs kyi mye nga myim mdzod
325a1('bum2): nyi mam mya / da du byang chu zhin du sangs phyi sbyin padang / dus byas stong ba nyid kyi ma thun/ bton du myi byed tshul bzhin du mi du mi rgya spyo myi chen pa dang / lun
325a2('bum2): sargyas stong ba nyid kyi'i da/ ba tid du bye tshum donan du mi sa mi mye marton pa dang / mtha pas 'das pa stong pa nyid myi 'ong myi ston dal ton du myi phyong tshul bzhin du mings myi byed tsong myi rten po dang / tshigs
325a3('bum2): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi stonang / kha ton du mi byang tshul bzhin du mi byed cing myi rton pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'di mi ston/ myi rten pa dang / tshul khrims kyi nyid myi 'di myi ston/ kha ton du mi byed tshul bzhin
325a4('bum2): du yid la mi byed cing myi rten pa dang / chos thas cad stong pa nyid myi 'di myi ston/ kha ton du mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing myi rton pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi 'di myi ston/ kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi
325a5('bum2): rten pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi 'di mi ston/ kha ton tu myi byad tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / ngos pa myed pa'i stong pa nyid myi 'di myi snyen kha ton du mi byang tshul bzhin du yid la myi bya
325a6('bum2): cing myi rten pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi 'di myi ston kha ton du myi bying tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yod la mi byed cing myi rten pa dang / 
325a7('bum2): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnaMs myi 'dri myi ston kha ton tu myed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myi 'di myi stonang / kha ton tu mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rten pa dang / rdzu
325a8('bum2): baphrul gi rkang pa nas myi 'di myi sbyin kha ton du mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la mye byed cing myi rten pa dang / dbang po nis myi 'di myi ston khon du mi byeng tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / stegs rnaMs mya ston kha ton du myi byed tshul
325b1('bum2): bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi 'di myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed
325b2('bum2): tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing myi rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi 'dri mi stond/ kha ton du mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la ma byed cing myi rten pa dang / bsam gtan pa rnams myi 'di myi stonang/ kha ton du myi byang tshul
325b3('bum2): bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rlond pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston do/ kha ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi'i dri myi ston kha tom du/ 
325b4('bum2): myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rnam par tha rang pa rnams myi 'di myi stonang / kha ton tu mi byed tshul bzhin du yi nga la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu/ 
325b5('bum2): myi 'dri myi snonang / kha ton du myi byed pa'i tshul bzhin du ying byed cing myi ston pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid du mchi nam mying pa nga smon pa myed pa myi 'di myi stonang // bya ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin
325b6('bum2): yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha tom du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing mi rten pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams myi 'di myi stonang / kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yingal
325b7('bum2): myi byed cing myo nad pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi 'dri mi ston do/ kho ton tu myi byed tshul bzhin du yidang la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobus myi 'dri myi stonang / kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi rkyed
325b8('bum2): cing myi rtend pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi 'di myi stonang / kha ton tu myi byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myo 'di myi ston/ kha ton du mi byang tshul bzhin du yid la m-i
326a1('bum2): byed cing myi rtend pa dang / byams pa chen po myi 'di myi stonang / kha ton tu mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing myi rten pa dang / snying rje chen po myi 'dri myi stond/ kha ton du mi byed cing myi stond pa dang / tshul bzhin tu
326a2('bum2): yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi 'di myi stonang / kha ton tu myi byeng tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing myi rten pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid myi 'di myi ston/ kha ton tu mi byed/ 
326a3('bum2): tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa dang / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi 'di myi ston kha ton du mi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi 'di myi ston kha ton du mi byed pa'i
326a4('bum2): tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rtend pa de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob ma mthobar/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du byed pa/ 
326a5('bum2): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gang zag byang chub seMs dpa'i theg pa ra/ da bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzo/ gas par 'tshang rgya ba'i don du yod cing / bzod pa dang mos pa dang lhag pa'i
326a6('bum2): bsam pa dang / dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / myi gtong ba yod cing brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'dri / lung 'bog go// kha ton byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// rten par
326a7('bum2): byed do// de ltar na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yod de bzod pa yod mos pa yod lhag pa'i bas pa yod/ dga' ba yod/ spro ba yong myi gtong ba yod/ brtson
326a8('bum2): 'grus myi 'dor ba yod pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yong su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongasu bzung ba dang / bzod / 
326b1('bum2): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongasu bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongasu bzung ba dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongasu bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / byi
326b2('bum2): nang stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yong su bzung bar/ 
326b3('bum2): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myang ba stong pa nyid kyis yong su 'azung ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bad/ 
326b4('bum2): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / dngos
326b5('bum2): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa/ nyid kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yongs su/ bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongasasu bzung ba dang / 
326b6('bum2): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yang su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yong su bzung ba dang / dbang po rjes kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis so su bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
326b7('bum2): rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongasu bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pas skyong su bzung ba dang / bas rten rjes kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / tshad myed pa rnaMs kyis yang su bzung ba pa/ 
326b8('bum2): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pas yong su bzung ba dang / rnaM brar thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chus yong su bzung ba dang / rna bar tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
327b1('bum2): rdzus cu ga dus rgyas sa sus bdung/ snron ra nga lasus / ma myong ba'i kyis dus su / gyis pas sus gyu
327b2('bum2): pa kyisas su 'du/ mang sa sa co kyi rnams sum rung / rnamam ngas sa myed pa skyes nyid kyis sa su nga/ dang myed pa nga chos so sum zung / ra bzhin
328a1('bum2): bzhin gshegs pa'i tshungs sus yongs sum bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa
328a2('bum2): dag par rig pa bzhis yongs sum bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs sum
328a3('bum2): zung sangs rgyasakyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs sum bzung / thams cad shes
328a4('bum2): nyid kyis yongs sum rdung / rim gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs sumazung / rnam
328a5('bum2): thams cad mkhyen panyid kyis yongs sum bcung nga byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
328a6('bum2): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bar ma dor nyes zhor 'gyur bar shes pa ra bya'o// 
328a7('bum2): oM ye d+ha ra ma he pra d+ha / 9dun/ shan ta thA ka te/ harba da te/ shan tsa yo ni/ ro d+ha I ba~M ba ti/ ma ha shra ma na ye/ swA hA/
